abstract: The Deal Professor dissects the acquisition agreement between Stanley Works and Black & Decker and the agreement between Berkshire Hathaway and Burlington Northern Santa Fe.
snippet: The Deal Professor dissects the acquisition agreement between Stanley Works and Black & Decker and the agreement between Berkshire Hathaway and Burlington Northern Santa Fe.
lead_paragraph: Update | Nov. 6, 10:13 a.m. The acquisition agreements for Stanley Works’ combination with Black & Decker and Berkshire Hathaway’s takeover of Burlington Northern Santa Fe have been filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission, and they both reinforce the themes that I highlighted on Tuesday in “2 Big Deals and the Search for an M.&A. Market.”

headline.main: Exploring the Details of 2 Notable Deals
